radiographic_examinations.findings: Negative for tuberculosis; no abnormalities noted.
Active fetus with normal fetal and placental anatomy; biometric assessment consistent with 19.0 weeks gestation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal fetal growth and activity throughout the pregnancy.
Fetal movements ceased approximately 7 hours before delivery.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Congenital group B β-hemolytic streptococcal infection with sepsis and pneumonia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Fetus appeared to have been dead for at least 24 hours prior to delivery.
